CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C picks up a frying pan
C holds out some knives to M
C set a cup by M
C puts toy chair on her chair and sits on it
C is doing something in dollhouse
C reaches in dollhouse and pulls out a plate
C gets pot; pours for M; laughs
C pours both cups making pouring noise
C starts to put cookie on large plate
C puts a cookie on own plate
M and C begin to look at a book together
C puts finger over her lips , as if to say shh
C is back with other book
break in tape; screen time jumps 13 secs
